question: What is Love INC?
answer: Love INC (Love In the Name of Christ) is a national movement that mobilizes local churches to transform lives and communities In the Name of Christ. Love INC affiliates like Love INC Newberg help churches work together to serve people in need—addressing spiritual, mental, emotional, and physical needs through a network of partner churches and volunteers.

question: What is Love INC Newberg?
answer: Love INC Newberg is a local affiliate of Love In the Name of Christ, serving the Newberg area since 2004. We connect people in need with local churches and service agencies who can help. Our mission is to mobilize local churches to transform lives and communities In the Name of Christ.

question: How do I get help or become a client?
answer: To become a Love INC client, call (503) 537-3999 or fill out the form on our website to schedule an intake appointment. You will meet with a volunteer to discuss your situation, assets, and needs. After intake, you may receive vouchers and referrals to local churches and agencies that can help. Our office hours are Monday–Thursday, 10am–1pm.

question: How can I volunteer?
answer: Love INC Newberg relies on volunteers from partner churches and the community. You can serve through Gap Ministries (filling specific unmet needs), Transformational Classes, the Connection Center, and more. Contact us at (503) 537-3999 or info@loveincnewberg.org, or visit our website to find out how you can be part of the transformation.

question: How can I donate?
answer: You can donate goods (such as clothing, furniture, or household items) or make a financial gift. This app includes options to give goods at specific locations or to make a secure online donation. Your support helps us mobilize churches and serve neighbors in need in the Newberg area.

question: What are Gap Ministries?
answer: Gap Ministries are specific, practical ways partner churches fill unmet needs in the community. They might include things like furniture vouchers, minor home repairs, transportation, or other help that falls between what government and traditional agencies offer. Each church offers different services; we help connect people in need with the right resources.

question: What are Transformational Classes?
answer: Transformational Classes are educational and mentorship opportunities offered through Love INC and partner churches. They are designed to support lasting life change—whether focused on finances, parenting, recovery, or other areas—and often include both teaching and one-on-one or small-group support.

question: What are your office hours?
answer: Love INC Newberg’s office is open Monday through Thursday, 10:00am–1:00pm. For the most up-to-date hours or to schedule an appointment, call (503) 537-3999 or email info@loveincnewberg.org.

question: How do I contact Love INC Newberg?
answer: You can reach us by phone at (503) 537-3999 or by email at info@loveincnewberg.org. Our office is at the address listed on our website. We’re open Monday–Thursday, 10am–1pm.

question: Is Love INC affiliated with one church or denomination?
answer: No. Love INC is a network of many different local churches working together. Love INC Newberg is ecumenical—we partner with churches across denominations to serve people in need. Our vision is a world where Christian churches are united in purpose and actively loving their neighbors in the Name of Christ.
